info.name: convolution
info.description: A module for convolving two 2d images

outputs.name: filtered_image
outputs.description: The result of convolution, stored in an image (all values are changed to fit between 0 and 255)

outputs.name: filtered_matrix
outputs.description: The result of convolution, stored in a matrix (all values, including their signs, are maintained)

parameters.name: kernel_type
parameters.description: The type of kernel used for convolution.

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: The format required for convolution with the specified kernel. The image type must be grayscale when applying the Sobel kernel.

parameters.name: image_max_range
parameters.description: The maximum value of a pixel in the image. Sometimes, we may want the pixel range to be (0, 1).

parameters.name: gaussian_sigma
parameters.description: The sigma used when creating the gaussian kernel.
